name: Problems with notifications on CMS and builds

updates.content:
One of our partner (Pusher) is currently having an issue.

This could prevent our admin interface to show a notification for actions such as: create a new field, update a field, destroy a field, forking an enviroment, duplicating a site, uploading a new upload and so on.

Please, refresh your browser page as the underneath operation might have been completed successfully even if no notification is shown.

Follow this issue ( https://status.pusher.com/incidents/k8bxxnb3z35y ) to get the most recent updates.

Also, this could lead to some builds failing with this message:

> Could not subscribe to real-time events!

Sorry for the inconvenience
A fix has been implemented by our partner and they are monitoring the result.
